name: Chevron
description:
Hey guys, thanks for playing my game!

CONTROLS: WASD or ARROW KEYS to move; LEFT CLICK to shoot.

I made this for the Wowie Jam 3.0 in three days. The theme was 'failure is progress', so I decided to create an upgrade system available only on death - dying allows you to upgrade your character. There is no such thing as failure, only setbacks. I believe in you!

NOTE: Some people have had issues with the web version. please try the download too if you come across a problem!

I appreciate all feedback, so please leave a comment!
